price: 59. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: “Ballankiinnu waa maalinta Ciidda, hana la soo kulmiyo Dadka barqadii.
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
